title: Add Mistral Models to Flax
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['src/transformers/models/mistral/modeling_flax_mistral.py', 'src/transformers/models/mistral/configuration_mistral.py', 'src/transformers/models/mistral/tokenization_mistral.py', 'src/transformers/models/__init__.py', 'src/transformers/__init__.py'], 'reasoning': '1. src/transformers/models/mistral/modeling_flax_mistral.py: This is the main Flax model implementation for Mistral, analogous to modeling_llama.py for Llama and required to provide JAX/Flax model support.
2. src/transformers/models/mistral/configuration_mistral.py: Needed for Mistral model configuration, similar to configuration_llama.py.
3. src/transformers/models/mistral/tokenization_mistral.py: For tokenizer integration and support (as with Llama), if required for end-to-end usability in Flax.
4. src/transformers/models/__init__.py: This file needs to be updated to register the new Mistral model and its Flax variant, ensuring proper import resolution.
5. src/transformers/__init__.py: Must be modified to add Mistral hooks to the overall registry/export structure for the library, following the pattern of Llama integration.'}
